skill.name: Dragonology

skill.name: Last Standing Man
skill.description: Increases max. HP and holy defense.

skill.name: HP Recovery

skill.name: SP Recovery
skill.description: Increases SP recovery while standing.

skill.name: Free Cast
skill.description: Allows movement and attack actions while casting a spell.

skill.name: Mallard's Eye
skill.description: Increases the attack range when using a bow.

skill.name: Charged Shot
skill.description: Increases bow attack rate. Pushes back the target.

skill.description: 3x3 splash attack. Pushes back the hitten enemies.

skill.description: The arrow hits all enemies in a 3-tile wide corridor on its way.

skill.description: Makes you jump to your target and attack immediately.

skill.description: Enchants your weapon with the fire element.

skill.name: Frost Weapon
skill.description: Enchants your weapon with the water element.

skill.name: Accumulate Magic Power
skill.description: Increases MATK for your next spell.

skill.name: Poison
skill.description: An attack with increased damage and a chance to poison your enemy.

skill.name: Soul Strike
skill.description: Standard magical strike.

skill.name: Napalm Beat
skill.description: Hits enemies in a 3x3 area around the target. Total damage is split between affected targets.

skill.name: Lightning Bolt
skill.description: Hits the enemy with a single lightning bolt.

skill.name: Nature Wall
skill.description: Creates a thorn wall between the caster and the target.

skill.name: Fire Arrow
skill.description: Hits the enemy with a single fire bolt.

skill.name: Fire Ball

skill.name: Fire Walk
skill.description: Generates fire under your feet, leaving a trail of fire element damage zones.

skill.name: Cold Touch
skill.description: Sends a water dart on your foe.

skill.name: Frost Diver
skill.description: Hits a single enemy with water element attack. Has a chance to freeze enemies.

skill.name: Frost Nova
skill.description: Hits every enemy in a 5x5 area around the caster with water element attack. Has a chance to freeze enemies.

skill.name: Holy Light
skill.description: A single harmonic energy hit.

skill.name: Detoxify
skill.description: Cures poison on target.

skill.name: Trick Dead
skill.description: You pretend to be dead. Monsters will not target you, but you can't recover HP or SP.

skill.name: Backsliding
skill.description: Moves you backwards 5 cells.

skill.name: Wind Walker
skill.description: Increases movement speed at 2% per skill level.

skill.name: Backpack Floating
skill.description: Improves maximum weight limit.

skill.name: Healing

skill.description: Heals a target for much more than the basic Heal skill.

skill.description: Lowers the enemies defense while increasing their attack.

skill.name: Stealing
skill.description: Provides a chance to steal drops from enemies.

skill.name: Barter
skill.description: Allows to sell items at increased prices.
